GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array with the article object corresponding to the given article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array with all the comments of an article

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: This is a bad article name

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the given article, returns the added comment.

body.body: This is the icellusedkars new comment!

comment.author: icellusedkars
comment.body: This is the icellusedkars new comment!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Update the given article number of votes passed on the body.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Delete the given comment from the database. Returns status 204 if deleted.

GET /api/users.description: Get all users from the database. Returns an array of user objects
